nodes.text: Resro was a group of two Class-G Cargo Containers used by the Imperial Navy during the Galactic Civil War.

During the First Battle of Omar in the Zaarin insurrection's Strategic Warfare campaign, the Resro group of Class-G Cargo Containers, composed of Resro 1 and Resro 2, were part of TIE Pilot Colonel Maarek Stele's defense forces for the Deep Space Manufacturing Facilities Omar.
